features: ⭐【4 in 1 STEM Kits for Kids Ages 6-8-12 】Experience the thrill of STEM projects with 4in1 Make Your Own Cars kit - a captivating educational and Puzzle-based activity. Ideal for kids aged 6-12, this STEM kit combines learning and fun as they assemble and play with racing cars, aircraft cars, and excavator cars. Encourage creativity and learning through hands-on fun!

⭐【Building toys for boys age 8-12 】Engage in STEM projects with this educational toy. Through assembling the model car kit, kids grasp vehicle structures, motor functions, and energy conversion principles. Ideal for learning while having fun with STEM kits and building toys.

⭐【learning by doing】Elevate learning with this STEM kit, promoting basic scientific knowledge, hands-on skills, and imagination. Kids enjoy assembling 3D wooden puzzles, fostering curiosity. An ideal blend of learning toys and building activities for educational growth.

⭐【Great Gift For Kids 6 To 12 Years old】This carefully designed set suits kids aged 8-12 Years old boys girls, offering a delightful challenge. Packed in an attractive box, these STEM activities captivate children upon unboxing. A perfect gift idea, it's educational, age-appropriate, and guarantees hours of screen-free fun for both boys and girls.

⭐【Durable & Safe STEM kit】Non-toxic plywood, punch-out ease. Smooth, rounded edges ensure kids' safety while assembling wooden puzzle toys. 3D parts from pollutant-free wood, laser pre-cut for tight integration, simple assembly. High-quality, recyclable materials throughout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery pack is fragile
reviews.reviewText: Nice kit for the price, but the battery pack wires are fragile, and once one of them rips out, the entire kit becomes useless.UPDATE: The seller got in touch with me and sent over two replacement packs, free of charge, so I'm updating the review to 5 stars to reflect the fact that they stood behind their product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Grandsons love it. Easy to understand instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good independent science kit
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as part of a birthday gift for my 9 year old daughter, who loves science. At the beginning her dad helped her with the hovercraft. She doesn’t want to wait for the next project. She used the motor to create a few more projects by herself. I’m happy when she shows me her independent projects. Her favorite one is using the little motor to draw on the round cards. Wish they come with more cards. But I cut more for her so she can invite friends to try. At the beginning when you first open the kit, it smells like chemical for a few minutes. So I took everything in the garage. Other than that, it’s really a smart and simple kit that Elementory kids can do it themselves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sounds good but my boy isn't so interested
reviews.reviewText: Its something that need an adult to built with the kids. Which I do work with them, but it's not interesting enough to keep them engaged. The idea is good though and looked fun, however, in realty, my son tired something out of this once and it got put back on the shelf never touched again... this was over 1 month now :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pieces don’t fit together, bad instructions
reviews.reviewText: Terrible! Doesn’t work! First issue was the instructions just have pictures and don’t truly label the pieces - not a huge deal, they’re all simple enough projects.First we tried the balloon boat. The pieces were slightly different than the pieces in the pictures but we figured it out - the directions talk about angling the straw to change the direction of the boat - but the hole in the boat is straight up and down, our straw could not be angled no matter how much we tried, and our boat went nowhere!Then we tried the motorized boat. Small issue, the cutouts are slightly different than pictured, as is the design of the motor. Now the big issue - We got it all assembled and my daughter was having a hard time attaching the propeller straw to the motor. I figured it just needed to be shoved on there tight, so I tried and tried and no matter what, it falls off. I tried electrical tape, it falls off. Looking through the instructions, this setup (the straw + motor) is used in most of the projects! So these components not fitting together is a huge deal. I hot glued them and it looks like it might hold for a little while under very gentle pressure, but really this is ridiculous. Waste of money, disappointed kids, and discouraged mom. Don’t waste your time and money on this poorly designed kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars STEM PROJECT KIT FOR KIDS
reviews.reviewText: Great Value for young kids, not high schoolers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun, but some items were broken, dirty, or didn’t work
reviews.reviewText: Fun projects for our 9-year-old girl who is very much into STEM. Unfortunately, some of the fun was ruined when the battery pack didn’t work right out of the box, and some other items were broken, dirty, or put together poorly. We ultimately purchased a rechargeable battery pack which might work out to be more economical, but still disappointing for the amount of money we paid for the kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great gift for kids who are into engineering and stem projects

Cumplen con lo prometido, los experimentos y los elementos que incluyen son seguros, solo si acaso no recomiendo donde se propone usar con agua y recomendaria proouesieran experimentos con los imanes que incluyen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing, so easy to use following the step by step instructions which come with videos. We have only done a few of them but they are great fun and even provide information about how the experiments work

reviews.reviewTitle: Wonderful do it yourself toy car
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loved making these cars.. it gave her a sense of accomplishment as she did all by her own , and it was working.. racing car and road roller car were here favourite.. highly recommended if you want your child to be an innovator..
Fun Chemistry Kit for children. My son enjoyed the science experiments.

reviews.reviewTitle: Such an awesome product .. Loved it
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter and it is totally worth it. Awesome product and the quality of the material is fantastic. My 8-year-old daughter started using it entirely on her own with no help from me. It's pretty exciting to assemble something like this which actually works.You can make more than 80+ projects. I thoroughly enjoyed doing activities along with my child. They have lot n lots of youtube videos that explain how you can make projects and very easy to follow. This kit develops child’s creativity and imagination and keeps them away from mobile gadgets.I really thank the Butterfly edu fields team for making such great learning and educational toys for kids.
